thread.title: Trump hails economy and "new American moment"

title: Trump hails economy and "new American moment"
text:
Trump hails economy and "new American moment"   01:46 
In his first State of the Union speech, U.S. President Donald Trump hailed what he said were his administration’s economic achievements during his first year in office, saying “a new American moment” was now at hand. (no reporter narration)
